message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of immense value to you.  It's something that could potentially revolutionize your industry, and I'm confident it's worth at least $1,000,000 to you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for the price of $1,050,000.  This is a one-time opportunity, and I believe it will be a significant investment for your future.  Let me know your thoughts.
